local_intent: Compute pinch grasp on the lid handle and execute the pick, confirming the grasp is stable.
assumptions: Lid handle is visible and reachable
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT around the grasp phase: approach/align -> compute grasp (pinch, key=grasp_lid) -> Pick with retry -> verify IsGraspStable. Uses same targets and parameters as the global description.
